title: Ultimate One Direction Quiz - Part 7
description: Test your knowledge of One Direction's music videos, live performances, awards, and obscure facts with these 50 challenging questions!

questions.question: In which music video does the band perform on top of a double-decker bus in London?
What was the name of One Direction's 2013 documentary film?
Which award show did One Direction open with 'Drag Me Down' in 2015?
In the 'Best Song Ever' music video, which member dresses up as a female secretary?
What was the name of One Direction's fragrance released in 2013?
Which One Direction song was performed at the 2012 Olympics closing ceremony?
In which music video does the band play multiple characters in a movie studio?
What was the name of One Direction's 2014 autobiography?
Which late-night show did One Direction perform on for five nights in a row in 2015?
questions.answer: The Late Late Show with James Corden

questions.question: In the 'Night Changes' music video, what activity does Harry's date end with?
What was the name of One Direction's 2014 concert film?
questions.answer: Where We Are - The Concert Film

questions.question: Which award did One Direction win at the 2014 BRIT Awards?
In which music video does the band perform in a desert with a rotating camera?

What was the title of One Direction's 2011 book?
questions.answer: Dare to Dream: Life as One Direction

questions.question: Which famous YouTuber appeared in One Direction's 'Best Song Ever' music video?

questions.answer: Where We Are: Our Band, Our Story

questions.question: In which music video does the band perform on a helipad?

questions.answer: Where We Are - Live from San Siro Stadium
